title: Ranked ARAM
body:
We all know Riot doesn't want to make ARAM ranked bcs of 'rng' yet it can be softened by making every player have 2 re-rolls every game.
with 15 champions to chose from every time ARAM would be viable to make into ranked que.

Would be more fun for some than current ranked modes.

replies.body: I want ranked aram because it would be better than solo duo ranked
Just don't allow champs like Ekko, MF, Lux, Morg or any of the other *is in every aram matches* to be picked.
They are not a threat honestly... there is no picking it's still random just more options with re-rolls.

> [{quoted}](name=Mahoh,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=Ww0zQGOX,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2019-11-12T20:38:16.360+0000)
>
> Just don't allow champs like Ekko, MF, Lux, Morg or any of the other *is in every aram matches* to be picked.

{{champion:245}} Yes, but he's just good atm, I don't think it's aram specific. The rest are not a problem.

Those that are a problem though:
{{champion:35}} boxes and too much free escape
{{champion:57}} or nerf his fucking saplings
{{champion:143}} her plant damage should be halved

Ekoo is good overall atm but easier to focus down with cc than in SR game.
Shaco is also good but any ranged/tank combo can clear boxes
Maokai is good as his ult can cover full map width adding some width to the map would solve his and anivia senna etc, problems
Zyra is similar to mao as their dmg is hard to escape as they cover most of the lanee/map so does donger etc.

20% more width to map would solve a lot of things.

It would just have no point, everything that is annoying about normal ranked LP and MMR would be magnified, rank would be somewhere beyond meaningless, and the players would put iron IV to shame for sheer toxicity.

Same goes for every ranked mode yet Aram is usually quicker and matchmaking is usually better would be way more fun if there were re-rolls all the time and if it was given meaning of Rank. there is MMR for ranked anyway.

Eh, I just veiw it as pointless. ARAM winning is based on how many ARAM op champs you have ({{champion:45}} {{champion:29}} etc)* and if your team isn't filled with bots.


*Note: In SR I think these champs are fine, they are just overpowered in ARAM

And i find there are many comps in ARAM that actually work obscene amounts of 'metas' that is why i find it so fun.

Full engage comp works full ac's comp work full tank/cc comps work full supp comps work.
Map should be a bit wider/have a flank thou for some champions to work without synergy but with 2 re-rolls each synergy is not hard to get.

i find aoe shields to be most annoying thing aside from straight down tanky champs like nasus ramus singed etc. but sill there are comps that beat them as well all depends on what you get and with re-rolls again you can get good synergy.

Showing what other team has while you have 15 seconds to take something from pool they cant see could also be viable.
Aram was more fun to me than ranked or tft or urfs this season as Riot has issues fixing ranked match making balance etc.
In aram it's more random and way more fun and that is the important part for me FUN.
everyone would just have 15 over powered meta aram champs. theres zero point lmfao
